title: Insights into the pressure-dependent physical properties of cubic Ca<sub>3</sub>MF<sub>3</sub> (M = As and Sb): First-principles calculations
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Md. Adil Hossain, Ali A. Sabi, Heider A. Abdulhussein, Ahmad A. Mousa, Mohammed S. Abu-Jafar, Redi Kristian Pingak, Abbas H. Abo Nasria, Waqed H. Hassan, Noorhan F. AlShaikh Mohammad, Asif Hosen
